Apocalypse has three meanings. First, it is the actual imagined end of the world, whether in Revelations or in Hollywood blockbusters.

results.t: APOCALYPSE | definition in the Cambridge English Dictionary
results.p: a very serious event resulting in great destruction and change: The book offers a vision of the future in which there is a great nuclear apocalypse.
Apocalypse, from the verb apokalypto, to reveal, is the name given to the last book in the Bible. It is also called the Book of Revelation.
